name: Onet Connect Animal Classic HD
description:
Onet Connect Animal Classic HD. Connect animal.

============================

Getting bored with the same old Onet Connect gameplay? Try Onet Connect Animal Classic HD, you will love it .

============================

Why Onet Connect Animal Classic HD?

Time Mode : Connect matching items and clear the level before time runs out.
200 more levels.
Icon: Classic items.
More game.

============================

How to play Onet Connect Animal Classic HD??

The main objective of this game is to remove all icon tiles.
Tap the icon tiles to select it.
You have to find two identical icon tiles that can be connected with up to 3 straight lines where there is no other tiles blocking on the connecting line path.

============================

Onet Connect Animal Classic HD? Is simple yet addicting pair solving puzzle game or matching game with a fresh gameplay. If you like connect / matching game, then your will love to play Onet Connect Animal Classic HD?.

Please contact us directly via email if you find an issue Onet Connect Animal Classic HD? or have a suggestion for us, that will surely help us to improve this game.

We look forward to receive your feedback about this game for further improvement. Hope this game can bring the excited moment for all of you guys.
